name: Nether (itch) (Trash Panda)
description:
In Nether, you play as a man able to cross the line between worlds. Overcome increasingly elaborate obstacles while shifting perspectives between our world and its eldritch mirror, the Nether. Hitting any object will kill you, so use your skills to survive moving walls, obelisks, and deadly stalactites to see just how far you can go… Nether uses an ‘endless runner’ gameplay loop, utilizing procedural level generation and distance-based difficulty; the further you go, the harder it becomes. It can be played with a keyboard & mouse or gamepad, however the tutorial prompts currently display keyboard interactions only. 

• Nether Blink: E  - (Controller: X)

• Jump: Space Bar  - (Controller: A)

• Cast Shadowbolt: L mouse click  - (Controller: Right Trigger)
